sentence.text: Barnidipine, a long-acting slow onset calcium antagonist.
Barnidipine is a stereochemically pure dihydropyridine calcium antagonist with a high potency
The drug showed a slow onset and long-lasting vasorelaxating effect in vitro, and strong antihypertensive activity in hypertension models
Barnidipine was shown to have a high vasoselectivity and offered protection in cardiac and renal ischaemia models
The in vitro drug:drug interaction profile suggests a low potential for clinically relevant interactions with concomitant medication
It can be anticipated that barnidipine is an attractive calcium antagonist, offering good blood pressure control without compensatory baroreflex activity
